dimensions: Warp x Weft: 10 x 7 cm (3 15/16 x 2 3/4 in.)
title: Vrouw Bodolphe (1643) by Frans Hals (1584-1666)
description: Woven souvenir based on the painting 'Vrouw Bodolphe' (1643) by Frans Hals (1584-1666). "W.W.L. CO. 1960 DEL. H.H." appears below the portrait. Salmon, pink, gray, white, and black on white warp.
name: Souvenir ribbon portrait
